852430.name: LUMINES REMASTERED Digital Deluxe DLC Bundle
852430.description:
LUMINES REMASTERED Digital Deluxe DLC includes:
  • Digital soundtrack sampler with 20 songs
  • Lumines Remastered 4K Desktop Wallpapers
  • 5 Lumines-themed avatars

Tracklist:

  1. URBANIZATION
  2. ROUNDABOUT
  3. SLIPPING
  4. SQUARE DANCE
  5. TALK 2 YOU
  6. Sister Walk
  7. Take a dog out a walk
  8. my generation
  9. Get Up and Go
  10. Fly Into The Sky
  11. 45degrees
  12. Morning Beats
  13. Japanese Form
  14. Please return my CD
  15. Mekong
  16. The Spy Loves Me
  17. moon beam
  18. neodymium
  19. fanatic
  20. merci

英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语
